name: Akuoumaru
passiveStat: For every point of the entire party's combined maximum Energy capacity, the Elemental Burst DMG of the character equipping this weapon is increased by  0.12%. A maximum of  40% increased Elemental Burst DMG can be achieved this way.

name: Alley Hunter
passiveStat: While the character equipped with this weapon is in the party but not on the field, their DMG increases by  2% every second up to a max of  20%. When the character is on the field for more than 4s, the aforementioned DMG buff decreases by  4% per second until it reaches 0%.

name: Amenoma Kageuchi
passiveStat: After casting an Elemental Skill, gain 1 Succession Seed. This effect can be triggered once every 5s. The Succession Seed lasts for 30s. Up to 3 Succession Seeds may exist simultaneously. After using an Elemental Burst, all Succession Seeds are consumed and after 2s, the character regenerates  6 Energy for each seed consumed.

name: Amos' Bow
passiveStat: Increases Normal and Charged Attack DMG by  12%. After a Normal or Charged Attack is fired, DMG dealt increases by a further  8% every 0.1s the arrow is in the air for up to 5 times.

name: Aqua Simulacra
passiveStat: HP is increased by  16%. When there are opponents nearby, the DMG dealt by the wielder of this weapon is increased by  20%. This will take effect whether the character is on-field or not.

name: Aquila Favonia
passiveStat: ATK is increased by  20%. Triggers on taking DMG: the soul of the Falcon of the West awakens, holding the banner of resistance aloft, regenerating HP equal to  100% of ATK and dealing  200% of ATK as DMG to surrounding opponents. This effect can only occur once every 15s.

name: Black Tassel
passiveStat: Increases DMG against slimes by  40%.

name: Blackcliff Agate
passiveStat: After defeating an enemy, ATK is increased by  12% for 30s. This effect has a maximum of 3 stacks, and the duration of each stack is independent of the others.

name: Blackcliff Longsword
passiveStat: After defeating an opponent, ATK is increased by  12% for 30s. This effect has a maximum of 3 stacks, and the duration of each stack is independent of the others.

name: Blackcliff Pole
passiveStat: After defeating an enemy, ATK is increased by  12% for 30s. This effect has a maximum of 3 stacks, and the duration of each stack is independent of the others.

name: Blackcliff Slasher
passiveStat: After defeating an opponent, ATK is increased by  12% for 30s. This effect has a maximum of 3 stacks, and the duration of each stack is independent of the others.

name: Blackcliff Warbow
passiveStat: After defeating an enemy, ATK is increased by  12% for 30s. This effect has a maximum of 3 stacks, and the duration of each stack is independent of the others.

name: Bloodtainted Greatsword
passiveStat: Increases DMG dealt against opponents affected by Pyro or Electro by  12%.

name: Calamity Queller
passiveStat: Gain  12% All Elemental DMG Bonus. Obtain Consummation for 20s after using an Elemental Skill, causing ATK to increase by  3.2% per second. This ATK increase has a maximum of 6 stacks. When the character equipped with this weapon is not on the field, Consummation's ATK increase is doubled.

name: Cinnabar Spindle
passiveStat: Elemental Skill DMG is increased by  40% of DEF. The effect will be triggered no more than once every 1.5s and will be cleared 0.1s after the Elemental Skill deals DMG.

name: Compound Bow
passiveStat: Normal Attack and Charged Attack hits increase ATK by  4% and Normal ATK SPD by  1.2% for 6s. Max 4 stacks. Can only occur once every 0.3s.

name: Cool Steel
passiveStat: Increases DMG against opponents affected by Hydro or Cryo by  12%.

name: Crescent Pike
passiveStat: After picking up an Elemental Orb/Particle, Normal and Charged Attacks deal additional DMG equal to  20% of ATK for 5s.

name: Dark Iron Sword
passiveStat: Upon causing an Overloaded, Superconduct, Electro-Charged, Quicken, Aggravate, Hyperbloom, or Electro-infused Swirl reaction, ATK is increased by  20% for 12s.

name: Deathmatch
passiveStat: If there are at least 2 opponents nearby, ATK is increased by  16% and DEF is increased by  16%. If there are fewer than 2 opponents nearby, ATK is increased by  24%.

name: Debate Club
passiveStat: After using an Elemental Skill, on hit, Normal and Charged Attacks deal additional DMG equal to  60% of ATK in a small AoE. Effect lasts 15s. DMG can only occur once every 3s.

name: Dodoco Tales
passiveStat: Normal Attack hits on opponents increase Charged Attack DMG by  16% for 6s. Charged Attack hits on opponents increase ATK by  8% for 6s.

name: Dragon's Bane
passiveStat: Increases DMG against opponents affected by Hydro or Pyro by  20%.

name: Dragonspine Spear
passiveStat: Hitting an opponent with Normal and Charged Attacks has a  60% chance of forming and dropping an Everfrost Icicle above them, dealing AoE DMG equal to  80% of ATK. Opponents affected by Cryo are instead dealt DMG equal to  200% of ATK. Can only occur once every 10s.

name: Elegy for the End
passiveStat: A part of the "Millennial Movement" that wanders amidst the winds. Increases Elemental Mastery by  60. When the Elemental Skills or Elemental Bursts of the character wielding this weapon hit opponents, that character gains a Sigil of Remembrance. This effect can be triggered once every 0.2s and can be triggered even if said character is not on the field. When you possess 4 Sigils of Remembrance, all of them will be consumed and all nearby party members will obtain the "Millennial Movement: Farewell Song" effect for 12s. "Millennial Movement: Farewell Song" increases Elemental Mastery by  100 and increases ATK by  20%. Once this effect is triggered, you will not gain Sigils of Remembrance for 20s. Of the many effects of the "Millennial Movement," buffs of the same type will not stack.

name: Emerald Orb
passiveStat: Upon causing a Vaporize, Electro-Charged, Frozen, Bloom, or a Hydro-infused Swirl reaction, increases ATK by  20% for 12s.

name: End of the Line
passiveStat: Triggers the Flowrider effect after using an Elemental Skill, dealing  80% ATK as AoE DMG upon hitting an opponent with an attack. Flowrider will be removed after 15s or after causing 3 instances of AoE DMG. Only 1 instance of AoE DMG can be caused every 2s in this way. Flowrider can be triggered once every 12s.

name: Engulfing Lightning
passiveStat: ATK increased by  28% of Energy Recharge over the base 100%. You can gain a maximum bonus of  80% ATK. Gain  30% Energy Recharge for 12s after using an Elemental Burst.

name: Everlasting Moonglow
passiveStat: Healing Bonus increased by  10%, Normal Attack DMG is increased by  1% of the Max HP of the character equipping this weapon. For 12s after using an Elemental Burst, Normal Attacks that hit opponents will restore 0.6 Energy. Energy can be restored this way once every 0.1s.

name: Eye of Perception
passiveStat: Normal and Charged Attacks have a 50% chance to fire a Bolt of Perception, dealing  240% ATK as DMG. This bolt can bounce between opponents a maximum of 4 times. This effect can occur once every  12s.

name: Fading Twilight
passiveStat: Has three states, Evengleam, Afterglow, and Dawnblaze, which increase DMG dealt by  6%/10%/14% respectively. When attacks hit opponents, this weapon will switch to the next state. This weapon can change states once every 7s. The character equipping this weapon can still trigger the state switch while not on the field.

name: Favonius Codex
passiveStat: CRIT Hits have a  60% chance to generate a small amount of Elemental Particles, which will regenerate 6 Energy for the character. Can only occur once every  12s.

name: Favonius Greatsword
passiveStat: CRIT Hits have a  60% chance to generate a small amount of Elemental Particles, which will regenerate 6 Energy for the character. Can only occur once every  12s.

name: Favonius Lance
passiveStat: CRIT Hits have a  60% chance to generate a small amount of Elemental Particles, which will regenerate 6 Energy for the character. Can only occur once every  12s.

name: Favonius Sword
passiveStat: CRIT Hits have a  60% chance to generate a small amount of Elemental Particles, which will regenerate 6 Energy for the character. Can only occur once every  12s.

name: Favonius Warbow
passiveStat: CRIT Hits have a  60% chance to generate a small amount of Elemental Particles, which will regenerate 6 Energy for the character. Can only occur once every  12s.

name: Ferrous Shadow
passiveStat: When HP falls below  70%, increases Charged Attack DMG by  30% and Charged Attacks become harder to interrupt.

name: Festering Desire
passiveStat: Increases Elemental Skill DMG by  16% and Elemental Skill CRIT Rate by  6%.

name: Fillet Blade
passiveStat: On hit, has a 50% chance to deal  240% ATK DMG to a single opponent. Can only occur once every  15s.

name: Forest Regalia
passiveStat: After triggering Burning, Quicken, Aggravate, Spread, Bloom, Hyperbloom, or Burgeon, a Leaf of Consciousness will be created around the character for a maximum of 10s. When picked up, the Leaf will grant the character  60 Elemental Mastery for 12s. Only 1 Leaf can be generated this way every 20s. This effect can still be triggered if the character is not on the field. The Leaf of Consciousness' effect cannot stack.

name: Freedom-Sworn
passiveStat: A part of the "Millennial Movement" that wanders amidst the winds. Increases DMG by  10%. When the character wielding this weapon triggers Elemental Reactions, they gain a Sigil of Rebellion. This effect can be triggered once every 0.5s and can be triggered even if said character is not on the field. When you possess 2 Sigils of Rebellion, all of them will be consumed and all nearby party members will obtain "Millennial Movement: Song of Resistance" for 12s. "Millennial Movement: Song of Resistance" increases Normal, Charged and Plunging Attack DMG by  16% and increases ATK by  20%. Once this effect is triggered, you will not gain Sigils of Rebellion for 20s. Of the many effects of the "Millennial Movement," buffs of the same type will not stack.

name: Frostbearer
passiveStat: Hitting an opponent with Normal and Charged Attacks has a  60% chance of forming and dropping an Everfrost Icicle above them, dealing AoE DMG equal to  80% of ATK. Opponents affected by Cryo are instead dealt DMG equal to  200% of ATK. Can only occur once every 10s.

name: Fruit of Fulfillment
passiveStat: Obtain the "Wax and Wane" effect after an Elemental Reaction is triggered, gaining  24 Elemental Mastery while losing 5% ATK. For every 0.3s, 1 stack of Wax and Wane can be gained. Max 5 stacks. For every 6s that go by without an Elemental Reaction being triggered, 1 stack will be lost. This effect can be triggered even when the character is off-field.

name: Hakushin Ring
passiveStat: After the character equipped with this weapon triggers an Electro elemental reaction, nearby party members of an Elemental Type involved in the elemental reaction receive a  10% Elemental DMG Bonus for their element, lasting 6s. Elemental Bonuses gained in this way cannot be stacked.

name: Halberd
passiveStat: Normal Attacks deal an additional  160% ATK as DMG. Can only occur once every 10s.

name: Hamayumi
passiveStat: Increases Normal Attack DMG by  16% and Charged Attack DMG by  12%. When the equipping character's Energy reaches 100%, this effect is increased by 100%.

name: Haran Geppaku Futsu
passiveStat: Obtain  12% All Elemental DMG Bonus. When other nearby party members use Elemental Skills, the character equipping this weapon will gain 1 Wavespike stack. Max 2 stacks. This effect can be triggered once every 0.3s. When the character equipping this weapon uses an Elemental Skill, all stacks of Wavespike will be consumed to gain Rippling Upheaval: each stack of Wavespike consumed will increase Normal Attack DMG by  20% for 8s.

name: Harbinger of Dawn
passiveStat: When HP is above 90%, increases CRIT Rate by  14%.

name: Hunter's Path
passiveStat: Gain  12% All Elemental DMG Bonus. Obtain the Tireless Hunt effect after hitting an opponent with a Charged Attack. This effect increases Charged Attack DMG by  160% of Elemental Mastery. This effect will be removed after 12 Charged Attacks or 10s. Only 1 instance of Tireless Hunt can be gained every 12s.

name: Iron Sting
passiveStat: Dealing Elemental DMG increases all DMG by  6% for 6s. Max 2 stacks. Can occur once every 1s.

name: Kagotsurube Isshin
passiveStat: When a Normal, Charged, or Plunging Attack hits an opponent, it will whip up a Hewing Gale, dealing AoE DMG equal to 180% of ATK and increasing ATK by 15% for 8s. This effect can be triggered once every 8s.

name: Kagura's Verity
passiveStat: Gains the Kagura Dance effect when using an Elemental Skill, causing the Elemental Skill DMG of the character wielding this weapon to increase by  12% for 16s. Max 3 stacks. This character will gain  12% All Elemental DMG Bonus when they possess 3 stacks.

name: Katsuragikiri Nagamasa
passiveStat: Increases Elemental Skill DMG by  6%. After Elemental Skill hits an opponent, the character loses 3 Energy but regenerates  3 Energy every 2s for the next 6s. This effect can occur once every 10s. Can be triggered even when the character is not on the field.

name: Key of Khaj-Nisut
passiveStat: HP increased by  20%. When an Elemental Skill hits opponents, you gain the Grand Hymn effect for 20s. This effect increases the equipping character's Elemental Mastery by  0.12% of their Max HP. This effect can trigger once every 0.3s. Max 3 stacks. When this effect gains 3 stacks, or when the third stack's duration is refreshed, the Elemental Mastery of all nearby party members will be increased by  0.2% of the equipping character's max HP for 20s.

name: King's Squire
passiveStat: Obtain the Teachings of the Forest effect when unleashing Elemental Skills and Bursts, increasing Elemental Mastery by  60 for 12s. This effect will be removed when switching characters. When the Teachings of the Forest effect ends or is removed, it will deal  100% of ATK as DMG to 1 nearby opponent. The Teachings of the Forest effect can be triggered once every 20s.

name: Kitain Cross Spear
passiveStat: Increases Elemental Skill DMG by  6%. After Elemental Skill hits an opponent, the character loses 3 Energy but regenerates  3 Energy every 2s for the next 6s. This effect can occur once every 10s. Can be triggered even when the character is not on the field.

name: Lion's Roar
passiveStat: Increases DMG against opponents affected by Pyro or Electro by  20%.

name: Lithic Blade
passiveStat: For every character in the party who hails from Liyue, the character who equips this weapon gains a  7% ATK increase and a  3% CRIT Rate increase. This effect stacks up to 4 times.

name: Lithic Spear
passiveStat: For every character in the party who hails from Liyue, the character who equips this weapon gains a  7% ATK increase and a  3% CRIT Rate increase. This effect stacks up to 4 times.

name: Lost Prayer to the Sacred Winds
passiveStat: Increases Movement SPD by 10%. When in battle, gain an  8% Elemental DMG Bonus every 4s. Max 4 stacks. Lasts until the character falls or leaves combat.

name: Luxurious Sea-Lord
passiveStat: Increases Elemental Burst DMG by  12%. When Elemental Burst hits opponents, there is a 100% chance of summoning a huge onrush of tuna that deals  100% ATK as AoE DMG. This effect can occur once every 15s.

name: Magic Guide
passiveStat: Increases DMG against opponents affected by Hydro or Electro by  12%.

name: Makhaira Aquamarine
passiveStat: The following effect will trigger every 10s: The equipping character will gain  24% of their Elemental Mastery as bonus ATK for 12s, with nearby party members gaining 30% of this buff for the same duration. Multiple instances of this weapon can allow this buff to stack. This effect will still trigger even if the character is not on the field.

name: Mappa Mare
passiveStat: Triggering an Elemental reaction grants a  8% Elemental DMG Bonus for 10s. Max 2 stacks.

name: Memory of Dust
passiveStat: Increases Shield Strength by  20%. Scoring hits on opponents increases ATK by  4% for 8s. Max 5 stacks. Can only occur once every 0.3s. While protected by a shield, this ATK increase effect is increased by 100%.

name: Messenger
passiveStat: Charged Attack hits on weak points deal an additional  100% ATK DMG as CRIT DMG. Can only occur once every 10s.

name: Missive Windspear
passiveStat: Within 10s after an Elemental Reaction is triggered, ATK is increased by  12% and Elemental Mastery is increased by  48.

name: Mistsplitter Reforged
passiveStat: Gain a  12% Elemental DMG Bonus for all elements and receive the might of the Mistsplitter's Emblem. At stack levels 1/2/3, the Mistsplitter's Emblem provides a  8/16/28% Elemental DMG Bonus for the character's Elemental Type. The character will obtain 1 stack of Mistsplitter's Emblem in each of the following scenarios: Normal Attack deals Elemental DMG (stack lasts 5s), casting Elemental Burst (stack lasts 10s); Energy is less than 100% (stack disappears when Energy is full). Each stack's duration is calculated independently.

name: Mitternachts Waltz
passiveStat: Normal Attack hits on opponents increase Elemental Skill DMG by  20% for 5s. Elemental Skill hits on opponents increase Normal Attack DMG by  20% for 5s.

name: Moonpiercer
passiveStat: After triggering Burning, Quicken, Aggravate, Spread, Bloom, Hyperbloom, or Burgeon, a Leaf of Revival will be created around the character for a maximum of 10s. When picked up, the Leaf will grant the character  16% ATK for 12s. Only 1 Leaf can be generated this way every 20s. This effect can still be triggered if the character is not on the field.

name: Mouun's Moon
passiveStat: For every point of the entire party's combined maximum Energy capacity, the Elemental Burst DMG of the character equipping this weapon is increased by  0.12%. A maximum of  40% increased Elemental Burst DMG can be achieved this way.

name: Oathsworn Eye
passiveStat: Increases Energy Recharge by  24% for 10s after using an Elemental Skill.

name: Otherworldly Story
passiveStat: Picking up an Elemental Energy Orb/Particle recovers  1% HP.

name: Polar Star
passiveStat: Elemental Skill and Elemental Burst DMG increased by  12%. After a Normal Attack, Charged Attack, Elemental Skill or Elemental Burst hits an opponent, 1 stack of Ashen Nightstar will be gained for 12s. When 1/2/3/4 stacks of Ashen Nightstar are present, ATK is increased by  10/20/30/48%. The stack of Ashen Nightstar created by the Normal Attack, Charged Attack, Elemental Skill or Elemental Burst will be counted independently of the others.

name: Predator
passiveStat: Effective only on the following platform:   "PlayStation Network"\nDealing Cryo DMG to opponents increases this character's Normal and Charged Attack DMG by 10% for 6s. This effect can have a maximum of 2 stacks. Additionally, when Aloy equips Predator, ATK is increased by 66.

name: Primordial Jade Cutter
passiveStat: HP increased by  20%. Additionally, provides an ATK Bonus based on  1.2% of the wielder's Max HP.

name: Primordial Jade Winged-Spear
passiveStat: On hit, increases ATK by  3.2% for 6s. Max 7 stacks. This effect can only occur once every 0.3s. While in possession of the maximum possible stacks, DMG dealt is increased by  12%.

name: Prototype Amber
passiveStat: Using an Elemental Burst regenerates  4 Energy every 2s for 6s. All party members will regenerate  4% HP every 2s for this duration.

name: Prototype Archaic
passiveStat: On hit, Normal or Charged Attacks have a 50% chance to deal an additional  240% ATK DMG to opponents within a small AoE. Can only occur once every 15s.

name: Prototype Crescent
passiveStat: Charged Attack hits on weak points increase Movement SPD by 10% and ATK by  36% for 10s.

name: Prototype Rancour
passiveStat: On hit, Normal or Charged Attacks increase ATK and DEF by  4% for 6s. Max 4 stacks. This effect can only occur once every 0.3s.

name: Prototype Starglitter
passiveStat: After using an Elemental Skill, increases Normal and Charged Attack DMG by  8% for 12s. Max 2 stacks.

passiveStat: Increases DMG against opponents affected by Hydro or Electro by  20%.

passiveStat: Increases DMG against opponents affected by Hydro or Pyro by  12%.

passiveStat: Defeating an opponent restores  8% HP.

name: Redhorn Stonethresher
passiveStat: DEF is increased by  28%. Normal and Charged Attack DMG is increased by  40% of DEF.

name: Royal Bow
passiveStat: Upon damaging an opponent, increases CRIT Rate by  8%. Max 5 stacks. A CRIT Hit removes all stacks.

passiveStat: Upon damaging an opponent, increases CRIT Rate by  8%. Max 5 stacks. A CRIT Hit removes all stacks.

passiveStat: Upon damaging an opponent, increases CRIT Rate by  8%. Max 5 stacks. A CRIT Hit removes all stacks.

passiveStat: Upon damaging an opponent, increases CRIT Rate by  8%. Max 5 stacks. A CRIT Hit removes all stacks.

name: Royal Spear
passiveStat: Upon damaging an opponent, increases CRIT Rate by  8%. Max 5 stacks. A CRIT Hit removes all stacks.

name: Rust
passiveStat: Increases Normal Attack DMG by  40% but decreases Charged Attack DMG by 10%.

name: Sacrificial Bow
passiveStat: After damaging an opponent with an Elemental Skill, the skill has a  40% chance to end its own CD. Can only occur once every  30s.

name: Sacrificial Fragments
passiveStat: After damaging an opponent with an Elemental Skill, the skill has a  40% chance to end its own CD. Can only occur once every  30s.

name: Sacrificial Greatsword
passiveStat: After damaging an opponent with an Elemental Skill, the skill has a  40% chance to end its own CD. Can only occur once every  30s.

name: Sacrificial Sword
passiveStat: After damaging an opponent with an Elemental Skill, the skill has a  40% chance to end its own CD. Can only occur once every  30s.

name: Sapwood Blade
passiveStat: After triggering Burning, Quicken, Aggravate, Spread, Bloom, Hyperbloom, or Burgeon, a Leaf of Consciousness will be created around the character for a maximum of 10s. When picked up, the Leaf will grant the character  60 Elemental Mastery for 12s. Only 1 Leaf can be generated this way every 20s. This effect can still be triggered if the character is not on the field. The Leaf of Consciousness' effect cannot stack.

name: Serpent Spine
passiveStat: Every 4s a character is on the field, they will deal  6% more DMG and take  3% more DMG. This effect has a maximum of 5 stacks and will not be reset if the character leaves the field, but will be reduced by 1 stack when the character takes DMG.

name: Sharpshooter's Oath
passiveStat: Increases DMG against weak spots by  24%.

name: Skyrider Greatsword
passiveStat: On hit, Normal or Charged Attacks increase ATK by  6% for 6s. Max 4 stacks. Can occur once every 0.5s.

name: Skyrider Sword
passiveStat: Using an Elemental Burst grants a  12% increase in ATK and Movement SPD for 15s.

name: Skyward Atlas
passiveStat: Increases Elemental DMG Bonus by  12%. Normal Attack hits have a 50% chance to earn the favor of the clouds, which actively seek out nearby opponents to attack for 15s, dealing  160% ATK DMG. Can only occur once every 30s.

name: Skyward Blade
passiveStat: CRIT Rate increased by  4%. Gains Skypiercing Might upon using an Elemental Burst: Increases Movement SPD by  10%, increases ATK SPD by  10%, and Normal and Charged hits deal additional DMG equal to  20% of ATK. Skypiercing Might lasts for 12s.

name: Skyward Harp
passiveStat: Increases CRIT DMG by  20%. Hits have a  60% chance to inflict a small AoE attack, dealing 125% Physical ATK DMG. Can only occur once every  4s.

name: Skyward Pride
passiveStat: Increases all DMG by  8%. After using an Elemental Burst, Normal or Charged Attack, on hit, creates a vacuum blade that does  80% of ATK as DMG to opponents along its path. Lasts for 20s or 8 vacuum blades.

name: Skyward Spine
passiveStat: Increases CRIT Rate by  8% and increases Normal ATK SPD by  12%. Additionally, Normal and Charged Attacks hits on opponents have a  50% chance to trigger a vacuum blade that deals  40% of ATK as DMG in a small AoE. This effect can occur no more than once every 2s.

name: Slingshot
passiveStat: If a Normal or Charged Attack hits a target within 0.3s of being fired, increases DMG by  36%. Otherwise, decreases DMG by 10%.

name: Snow-Tombed Starsilver
passiveStat: Hitting an opponent with Normal and Charged Attacks has a  60% chance of forming and dropping an Everfrost Icicle above them, dealing AoE DMG equal to  80% of ATK. Opponents affected by Cryo are instead dealt DMG equal to  200% of ATK. Can only occur once every 10s.

name: Solar Pearl
passiveStat: Normal Attack hits increase Elemental Skill and Elemental Burst DMG by  20% for 6s. Likewise, Elemental Skill or Elemental Burst hits increase Normal Attack DMG by  20% for 6s.

name: Song of Broken Pines
passiveStat: A part of the "Millennial Movement" that wanders amidst the winds. Increases ATK by  16%, and when Normal or Charged Attacks hit opponents, the character gains a Sigil of Whispers. This effect can be triggered once every 0.3s. When you possess 4 Sigils of Whispers, all of them will be consumed and all nearby party members will obtain the "Millennial Movement: Banner-Hymn" effect for 12s. "Millennial Movement: Banner-Hymn" increases Normal ATK SPD by  12% and increases ATK by  20%. Once this effect is triggered, you will not gain Sigils of Whispers for 20s. Of the many effects of the "Millennial Movement," buffs of the same type will not stack.

name: Staff of Homa
passiveStat: HP increased by  20%. Additionally, provides an ATK Bonus based on  0.8% of the wielder's Max HP. When the wielder's HP is less than 50%, this ATK Bonus is increased by an additional  1% of Max HP.

name: Staff of the Scarlet Sands
passiveStat: The equipping character gains  52% of their Elemental Mastery as bonus ATK. When an Elemental Skill hits opponents, the Dream of the Scarlet Sands effect will be gained for 10s: The equipping character will gain  28% of their Elemental Mastery as bonus ATK. Max 3 stacks.

name: Summit Shaper
passiveStat: Increases Shield Strength by  20%. Scoring hits on opponents increases ATK by  4% for 8s. Max 5 stacks. Can only occur once every 0.3s. While protected by a shield, this ATK increase effect is increased by 100%.

name: Sword of Descension
passiveStat: Effective only on the following platform:   "PlayStation Network"\nHitting opponents with Normal and Charged Attacks grants a  50% chance to deal  200% ATK as DMG in a small AoE. This effect can only occur once every 10s. Additionally, if the Traveler equips the Sword of Descension, their ATK is increased by  66.

name: The Alley Flash
passiveStat: Increases DMG dealt by the character equipping this weapon by  12%. Taking DMG disables this effect for 5s.

name: The Bell
passiveStat: Taking DMG generates a shield which absorbs DMG up to  20% of Max HP. This shield lasts for 10s or until broken, and can only be triggered once every  45s. While protected by a shield, the character gains  12% increased DMG.

name: The Black Sword
passiveStat: Increases DMG dealt by Normal and Charged Attacks by  20%. Additionally, regenerates  60% of ATK as HP when Normal and Charged Attacks score a CRIT Hit. This effect can occur once every 5s.

name: "The Catch"
passiveStat: Increases Elemental Burst DMG by  16% and Elemental Burst CRIT Rate by  6%.

name: The Flute
passiveStat: Normal or Charged Attacks grant a Harmonic on hits. Gaining 5 Harmonics triggers the power of music and deals  100% ATK DMG to surrounding opponents. Harmonics last up to 30s, and a maximum of 1 can be gained every 0.5s.

name: The Stringless
passiveStat: Increases Elemental Skill and Elemental Burst DMG by  24%.

name: The Unforged
passiveStat: Increases Shield Strength by  20%. Scoring hits on opponents increases ATK by  4% for 8s. Max 5 stacks. Can only occur once every 0.3s. While protected by a shield, this ATK increase effect is increased by 100%.

name: The Viridescent Hunt
passiveStat: Upon hit, Normal and Charged Attacks have a 50% chance to generate a Cyclone, which will continuously attract surrounding opponents, dealing  40% of ATK as DMG to these opponents every 0.5s for 4s. This effect can only occur once every  14s.

name: The Widsith
passiveStat: When the character takes the field, they will gain a random theme song for 10s. This can only occur once every 30s. Recitative: ATK is increased by  60%. Aria: Increases all Elemental DMG by  48%. Interlude: Elemental Mastery is increased by  240.

name: Thrilling Tales of Dragon Slayers
passiveStat: When switching characters, the new character taking the field has their ATK increased by  24% for 10s. This effect can only occur once every 20s.

name: Thundering Pulse
passiveStat: Increases ATK by  20% and grants the might of the Thunder Emblem. At stack levels 1/2/3, the Thunder Emblem increases Normal Attack DMG by  12/24/40%. The character will obtain 1 stack of Thunder Emblem in each of the following scenarios: Normal Attack deals DMG (stack lasts 5s), casting Elemental Skill (stack lasts 10s); Energy is less than 100% (stack disappears when Energy is full). Each stack's duration is calculated independently.

name: Traveler's Handy Sword
passiveStat: Each Elemental Orb or Particle collected restores  1% HP.

name: Twin Nephrite
passiveStat: Defeating an opponent increases Movement SPD and ATK by  12% for 15s.

name: Vortex Vanquisher
passiveStat: Increases Shield Strength by  20%. Scoring hits on opponents increases ATK by  4% for 8s. Max 5 stacks. Can only occur once every 0.3s. While protected by a shield, this ATK increase effect is increased by 100%.

name: Wandering Evenstar
passiveStat: The following effect will trigger every 10s: The equipping character will gain  24% of their Elemental Mastery as bonus ATK for 12s, with nearby party members gaining 30% of this buff for the same duration. Multiple instances of this weapon can allow this buff to stack. This effect will still trigger even if the character is not on the field.

name: Wavebreaker's Fin
passiveStat: For every point of the entire party's combined maximum Energy capacity, the Elemental Burst DMG of the character equipping this weapon is increased by  0.12%. A maximum of  40% increased Elemental Burst DMG can be achieved this way.

name: White Iron Greatsword
passiveStat: Defeating an opponent restores  8% HP.

name: White Tassel
passiveStat: Increases Normal Attack DMG by  24%.

name: Whiteblind
passiveStat: On hit, Normal or Charged Attacks increase ATK and DEF by  6% for 6s. Max 4 stacks. This effect can only occur once every 0.5s.

name: Windblume Ode
passiveStat: After using an Elemental Skill, receive a boon from the ancient wish of the Windblume, increasing ATK by  16% for 6s.

name: Wine and Song
passiveStat: Hitting an opponent with a Normal Attack decreases the Stamina consumption of Sprint or Alternate Sprint by  14% for 5s. Additionally, using a Sprint or Alternate Sprint ability increases ATK by  20% for 5s.

name: Wolf's Gravestone
passiveStat: Increases ATK by  20%. On hit, attacks against opponents with less than 30% HP increase all party members' ATK by  40% for 12s. Can only occur once every 30s.

name: Xiphos' Moonlight
passiveStat: The following effect will trigger every 10s: The equipping character will gain  0.036% Energy Recharge for each point of Elemental Mastery they possess for 12s, with nearby party members gaining 30% of this buff for the same duration. Multiple instances of this weapon can allow this buff to stack. This effect will still trigger even if the character is not on the field.
